title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 609.6 - Action on petitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 609.6 - Action on petitions

State Regulations

The department shall examine the facts and circumstances
set forth in the petition, and in accordance with the considerations set forth
in section
609.3
of this Part may, in its
discretion, initiate rule making to reclassify the waters. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
609.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
